about_the_game:
You are the cursor of an enigmatic game in a broken and harsh world.

TRETIS is the post-apocalyptic version of an arcade machine: immerse yourself in an adventure with subversive mechanics of extra-squeezed puzzle-action.
The world has broken and you, like the cursor that once guided pieces neatly into place, are now lost with no apparent purpose.

  • Explore a dystopian arcade world
  • Change how you control your pieces in a dynamic and immersive experience.
  • A different arcade aesthetic that will captivate you with a mysterious narrative.
  • 5 semi-open campaigns of contrasting themes with puzzles and mechanics that will challenge your wits.
  • Fast-paced gameplay: Play, replay and compete with yourself!
